languages.text: {n}Капеллан деловито обозревает сцену побоища.{/n} "Отлично. Денз был бы доволен такими похоронами!"
{n}Chaplain looks at the carnage around him matter-of-factly.{/n} "Wonderful. This is a funeral Denz would be proud of!"
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан деловито обозревает сцену побоища.{/n} "Отлично. Денз был бы доволен такими похоронами!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain is looking at the carnage around him matter-of-factly.{/n} "Wonderful. Denz would be proud of such a funeral!"

{n}Chaplain looks at the carnage around him matter-of-factly.{/n} "Wonderful. This is a funeral Denz would be proud of!"

languages.text: {n}牧师看着周围的这场大屠杀，以事不关己的语气开了口。{/n}“真是太棒了，丹兹一定会为这样的葬礼感到自豪！”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at the carnage around him matter-of-factly.{/n} "Wonderful. This is a funeral Denz would be proud of!"

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师看着周围的这场大屠杀，以事不关己的语气开了口。{/n}“真是太棒了，丹兹一定会为这样的葬礼感到自豪！”

languages.text: {n}El capellán mira impasible la masacre que le rodea.{/n} «Fantástico. ¡Denz habría estado orgulloso de este funeral!».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at the carnage around him matter-of-factly.{/n} "Wonderful. This is a funeral Denz would be proud of!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El capellán mira impasible la masacre que le rodea.{/n} «Fantástico. ¡Denz habría estado orgulloso de este funeral!».

languages.text: {n}教戒官は周囲の殺戮を淡々と見た。{/n}「素晴らしい。このような葬式が挙げられて、デンツも喜んでいることでしょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at the carnage around him matter-of-factly.{/n} "Wonderful. This is a funeral Denz would be proud of!"

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官は周囲の殺戮を淡々と見た。{/n}「素晴らしい。このような葬式が挙げられて、デンツも喜んでいることでしょう！」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester sieht sich das Gemetzel um sich herum distanziert an.{/n} "Wunderbar! Auf so eine Bestattung wäre Denz stolz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at the carnage around him matter-of-factly.{/n} "Wonderful. This is a funeral Denz would be proud of!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester sieht sich das Gemetzel um sich herum distanziert an.{/n} "Wunderbar! Auf so eine Bestattung wäre Denz stolz!"

languages.text: {n}Chapelain, quant à lui, observe le carnage autour de lui sans montrer la moindre émotion.{/n} « Magnifique. Voilà des funérailles dignes de Denz ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at the carnage around him matter-of-factly.{/n} "Wonderful. This is a funeral Denz would be proud of!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain, quant à lui, observe le carnage autour de lui sans montrer la moindre émotion.{/n} « Magnifique. Voilà des funérailles dignes de Denz ! »

languages.text: {n}Papaz, sakin sakin etrafındaki katliama bakıyor.{/n} "Harika. Denz, bu cenazeyle gurur duyardı işte!"
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at the carnage around him matter-of-factly.{/n} "Wonderful. This is a funeral Denz would be proud of!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz, etrafındaki katliama duygusuzca bakıyor.{/n} "Mükemmel. Denz, bu cenazeyle gurur duyardı işte!"
